about_the_game:
THE GAME

A 4X experience playable in about an hour or two! Fealty is a tactical, turn-based strategy game that you enjoy on your own or with friends as you embark on an epic struggle to claim the empty throne. Claim the crown by developing your lands, increasing your strength, and making your rivals bend the knee! Engage in tactical, thoughtful strategy to conquer enemy territory. Force your foes to fight for your banner and aide you in claiming your rightful place on the throne.

MY LIEGE! THE KING IS DEAD...

Without an heir, the Nobles have declared a war for the throne. You've no choice but to fight. As one of the six Nobles, your claim to the throne is as strong, if not more so, than that of the others. To claim the throne, you must gather their sigils under your banner. Each Noble must join you, or perish. It is the only path to peace.

The fate of the realm is at stake.

Claim the throne... or bend the knee!

FEATURES

  • COMPRESSED 4X: Play a full game in about an hour or two! Focus on your strategy and tactics rather than resource management.
  • PROCEDURALLY GENERATED MAPS: Never play the same game twice. Well, it's possible, but unlikely.
  • TACTICAL TURN-BASED STRATEGY: Simple rules designed to be easy to learn but challenging to master.
  • UNIQUE DIPLOMACY SYSTEM: Demand fealty and make vassals of your foes. Their strength joins yours. But be careful, they may backstab you when you least expect it!
  • ONLINE MULTIPLAYER: 2 - 6 players vie for the throne in competitive online play.
  • ASYNCHRONOUS OR SIMULTANEOUS TURNS: Choose to play online together, or take your turn at your convenience.
  • DEVELOP YOUR LANDS: Expand your control by building farms, villages and mage towers.
  • RAISE YOUR ARMIES: Simple controls give you the power to easily get your armies to the front lines to impose your will.
  • DEFEND YOUR TERRITORY: Construct watch towers to keep a lookout and defend your flanks from enemy attack.
  • BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS: Treat your eyes to majestic, vibrant, low-poly, board-game and comic book inspired art.
  • IMMERSIVE SOUND: Delight in the alluring musical soundtrack.
